# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| latest  | ✅        |
| < latest| ❌        |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please email **security [at] attendi [dot] nl** with:
* A description of the flaw
* Steps to reproduce
* Your PGP public key (optional)

Do **not** create public GitHub issues for security problems.
